short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Wotodo is a note taking extension which is always at hand in your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Wotodo is a note taking extension which is always at hand in your browser. Whether you're taking notes on a video or an article, doing a research or just making a to-do list, Wotodo is 1 click away from you.
